question: Joshua has 6 £20 bills. He buys six puzzles for £8 each. He also buys 7 packs of stickers for £9 each. How much money does he have left?
answer:
Joshua starts off with 6 * £20 = £<<6*20=120>>120.
Joshua spends 6*£8 = £<<6*8=48>>48 on puzzles.
Joshua spends 7 packs of stickers * £9 = £<<7*9=63>>63 on stickers.
Total Joshua has spent £48 + £63 = £<<48+63=111>>111.
Joshua has £120 - £111 = £<<120-111=9>>9 remaining.
#### 9
